column2: "Hey, what gives?! Have you gone nuts or somethin'?! There's no way you can beat that thing!"
"Not that I don't want ya to beat it, just, you know..."
"You're a real optimist, ain't ya, killer. I totally get why everyone believes in ya."
"All I can do is root for ya, so that'll have to do. Now go get 'em, killer!"
